welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto Montt, where the stunning landscapes of the Andes meet the tranquil waters of the Pacific. Get ready to experience the charm of this port city, known for its vibrant markets, delicious seafood, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Puerto Montt has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Refugio Austral Cafe-Restobar
restaurants.description: Refugio Austral Cafe-Restobar is a breakfast spot located in Puerto Montt.
restaurants.address: Av. Pedro Montt 179, Puerto Montt, Los Lagos

restaurants.name: Casa Colomba Café & Bar

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frutillar Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Frutillar Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.
